definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: There were alot of dead and wounded everywhere and alot of the groups were dragging and carrying wounded.
sentences.chinese: 到处都是阵亡者和伤者，许多人正在抬运伤者。

sentences.english: For a time, Bulq was listed as one of the casualties of that fateful battle.
sentences.chinese: 巴尔克一度被列为那场惨烈战斗的阵亡者之一。

definition: to sacrifice oneself in a just cause/a victim of a disaster
to die in an accident/to die for a just cause
sb who sacrifices himself/sacrificial victim/sb who is expendable
to be wounded/to sustain an injury
